page.title: 19SHIPDHAM COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: {Shipdham Community Centre}was opened in May 1982. It is attached to, and was constructed with, the local First and Middle School. A Community Centre Association was established in 1979 to promote the development of the Community Centre. Responsibility for the Community Centre is divided between 3 bodies; 1.{Shipdham Parish Council 2.{Breckland District Council 3.{Community Centre Association The lease of the building is vested in the Parish Council. The Centre is administered by a Management Committee on behalf of the Parish Council. Its members are appointed by the Parish Council to represent the community. The day to day organisation is the responsibility of the Community Centre Association which is an annually elected body representative of users.
